Service Details: - Addresses ways to minimize the impact of geese within an urban environment and manage the Okanagan Valley Canada Goose population to reduce conflict between people and Geese- Reduces risk of potential human harm due to contamination of water and other public resources- Reduces goose populations to naturally sustainable levels, e.g. sufficient native habitat to support the goose population without problematic use of public park and urban lands- Returns goose behaviour to a native condition, e.g. fear of humans and not approaching for food, and educates people on the importance of allowing geese to remain wild
